body_html:
I followed the tensorflow tutorial for retraining inception but when typed retrain this occured. I am running it on a virtual env on a macbook pro. How do i get the build file on a virtual env.

bazel build tensorflow/examples/image_retraining:retrain
ERROR: no such package 'tensorflow/examples/image_retraining': BUILD file not found on package path.
INFO: Elapsed time: 1.469s

body:
I followed the tensorflow tutorial for retraining inception but when typed retrain this occured. I am running it on a virtual env on a macbook pro.  How do i get the build file on a virtual env.


bazel build tensorflow/examples/image_retraining:retrain
ERROR: no such package 'tensorflow/examples/image_retraining': BUILD file not found on package path.
